title: Practice-Based Workplace Mathematics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and foundational practical understanding of job-related tasks
context.additional_context: A course focused on strengthening math problem-solving skills in real workplace scenarios for mid-level professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify mathematical problems arising in real-world job situations and apply a structured analysis process.
Learners can lead practical knowledge-sharing sessions through collaboration with peers and solve complex mathematical tasks.
Learners can propose work process improvement plans using mathematical modeling techniques based on field case studies.

resources: Collaboration Tools (Digital Whiteboard, Real-Time Document Sharing)
Weekly Session with Industry Experts (1 session/week)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
